interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Liquid Metallic Lipstick, Long Lasting Lip Color, Smudge Proof Makeup, Berried, 3.5 mL
Review Date: 2022/08/12
Store: Beauty Bakerie
Product Description: ['Beauty Bakerie Berried metallic Lip whip is a metallic red liquid lipstick with hints of deep purple. It is long-lasting, smudge-proof and waterproof. Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.']
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Beauty Bakerie', 'Color': 'Berried', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.59 x 3.54 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '754680458186', 'UPC': '754680458186', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bakerie Cosmetics Brand'}
Review Text: The color is beautifully pigmented and actually maintains a metallic look on the lips. I only needed to do one coat. I will say the longevity isn't that great. It lasted about an hour of me just talking and started settling in the lines and cracks of my lips, so it required constant reapplication. Stunning color, but a bit of a hassle. I love the applicator though.
Review Title: Love the applicator
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LOVE CINEMA Curl & Volume-up Mascara 111
LOVE CINEMA
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.47 x 0.87 x 0.67 inches; 1.02 Ounces', 'UPC': '795827835224'}
The mascara does a great job. No clumping or flaking. I was able to go in with multiple coats without clumping as as I wore it throughout the day, I didn't notice any flakes on my face. I honestly didn't notice any extra lengthening or volumizing with this product though. It goes on easily though. It is one of the few mascaras that I experienced absolutely no clumping with, so I'll be a return customer just for that alone as clumping is a huge pet peeve of mine. I recommend, just don't expect miracles. It is a great mascara regardless.
Good, just nothing special
MRTREUP Hair Brush Spray Set With Detangling Wide Tooth Comb And Detanger Brush For Curly Hair With Hair Mist Spray Bottle 10oz Curl Hair Tools For Women Men Black Natural Hair 3a To 4c Hair Types
MRTREUP
{'Brand': 'MRTREUP', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Plastic', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 2 x 5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
I originally ordered this with he hopes of using this for my own thick hair, but didn't get much mileage from the brushes. The comb was good for detangling before and during my hair wash routine, but the brushes were too pliable for me to get a decent use out of them, I was just getting frustrated. Even after applying product, I was unimpressed. However, I have been using them as wig brushes and they work perfectly for finer, thinner hair types. Hands down, the mister is the best product out of the bunch. Have been using it continuously for a while now and it's worked flawlessly.
Good for wigs. The mister is the best part.
5 Pieces Nail Brushes for Nail Art Nail Design Brushes Dotting Tools for Nails Nail Detail Brush Double-Ended Brush and Dotting Tool Kit
Mcduyant
{'Brand': 'Mcduyant', 'Handle Material': 'Plastic', 'Head Material': 'Nylon', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.33 x 3.03 x 0.39 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'JYM-10'}
This set is so cute and an added plus is the dual end sites with a brush and dotter tool. The dotting tools are different sizes, llowing you more options for designs. I especially love the two thin line brushes that allow me to do more fine, detailed designs. Highly recommend to get the basics and start a collection.
Great starer brushes

PLIISLUP

The drill is nice and quiet, it runs so smooth. It was such a breeze work with and I find myself reaching for it out of all the drills I have. I love the variety of the different drill bits and accessories it comes with. This is a great first drill for first timers and beginners. It's easy to work with and not daunting to use.
Smooth and quiet

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Key Preferences:** 
  - Prefers makeup products that do not clump or flake, valuing ease of application.
  - Seeks reliable performance over exaggerated results, emphasizing a practical approach in beauty routines.

- **Trends:**
  - Tends toward functional and dependable products in makeup and nail care tools, demonstrating brand loyalty based on consistent performance.
  - Prefers products that deliver on their promises, often expressing disappointment with those that fail to meet expectations.
  - Recently sought versatile, user-friendly nail care equipment, indicating an increased interest in enhancing creativity while maintaining functionality.
  - Has experience with a metallic lip product that, while initially appealing, did not meet longevity expectations, suggesting a continued prioritization of practical effectiveness over aesthetic appeal.

- **Behavior Patterns:**
  - Likely to provide detailed feedback on product performance, outlining personal standards in makeup and hair care.
  - Adopts a balanced assessment of products, recognizing both strengths and weaknesses.
  - Will recommend tools and products based on reliable performance and ease of use, reinforcing a commitment to practicality and creativity in beauty routines.
  - Displays a preference for applicators and tools that enhance user experience, underscoring the importance of practicality alongside artistry in cosmetic application. 

This revised summary reflects the user’s ongoing pursuit of creativity and effectiveness in their beauty regimen while maintaining realistic expectations for product performance.
